title: Index Error in "inferenceutils.py" at GUI  "step2: convert to tracklets"

labels.name: more-data-requested-by-us
labels.description: We would like to get more data to answer

body:
Thanks for opening this issue, and thanks for using DeepLabCut (we hope you are enjoying it ;). Please fill out the template completely, including the full "traceback" and input code that you ran to hit this error. **Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version** Windows 10 2.2rc2 (updated again from latest github master folder on June 11) env: DLC-GPU (following installation instruction) **Please complete the following information about your system:** I started a multi-animal project (GUI) training by tracking 10 individuals (5 red dots, 5 white dots; each were marked as 2 bodyparts, identity = false). After train network -> evalulate network -> analyze videos (step1: analyze videos), when I clicked "step2: convert to tracklets", I saw following index errors from terminal output. Could you help me have a look at it? Thanks **Please place code inside this:**
Code output

Config: {'all_joints': [[0], [1], [2]], 'all_joints_names': ['bodypart1', 'bodypart2', 'fooddot'], 'batch_size': 1, 'crop_pad': 0, 'dataset': 'training-datasets\\iteration-0\\UnaugmentedDataSet_test5Jun13\\test5_LJ95shuffle1.pickle', 'dataset_type': 'multi-animal-imgaug', 'deterministic': False, 'fg_fraction': 0.25, 'global_scale': 0.8, 'init_weights': 'E:\\anaconda3\\envs\\DLC-GPU\\lib\\site-packages\\deeplabcut\\pose_estimation_tensorflow\\models\\pretrained\\resnet_v1_50.ckpt', 'intermediate_supervision': False, 'intermediate_supervision_layer': 12, 'location_refinement': True, 'locref_huber_loss': True, 'locref_loss_weight': 1.0, 'locref_stdev': 7.2801, 'log_dir': 'log', 'mean_pixel': [123.68, 116.779, 103.939], 'minconfidence': 0.01, 'mirror': False, 'multi_stage': False, 'net_type': 'resnet_50', 'nmsradius': 5.0, 'num_idchannel': 0, 'num_joints': 3, 'num_limbs': 1, 'optimizer': 'sgd', 'pairwise_huber_loss': True, 'pairwise_predict': False, 'partaffinityfield_graph': [[0, 1]], 'partaffinityfield_predict': True, 'regularize': False, 'scoremap_dir': 'test', 'shuffle': True, 'snapshot_prefix': 'E:\\test5-LJ-2021-06-13\\dlc-models\\iteration-0\\test5Jun13-trainset95shuffle1\\test\\snapshot', 'stride': 8.0, 'weigh_negatives': False, 'weigh_only_present_joints': False, 'weigh_part_predictions': False, 'weight_decay': 0.0001} Using snapshot-200000 for model E:\test5-LJ-2021-06-13\dlc-models\iteration-0\test5Jun13-trainset95shuffle1 Processing... E:\test5-LJ-2021-06-13\videos\10.mp4 E:\test5-LJ-2021-06-13\videos already exists! Analyzing E:\test5-LJ-2021-06-13\videos\10DLC_resnet50_test5Jun13shuffle1_200000.h5 0it [00:00, ?it/s] Traceback (most recent call last): File "E:\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\gui\analyze_videos.py", line 424, in convert2_tracklets identity_only=self.identity_toggle.GetStringSelection() == "Yes", File "E:\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\predict_videos.py", line 1490, in convert_detections2tracklets ass.assemble() File "E:\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 721, in assemble assemblies, unique = self._assemble(data_dict, i) File "E:\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 642, in _assemble p = max(self.calc_link_probability(link), 0.001) File "E:\anaconda3\envs\DLC-GPU\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_tensorflow\lib\inferenceutils.py", line 327, in calc_link_probability sigma = self._kde.covariance[i, j] IndexError: index 1 is out of bounds for axis 1 with size 1

**How to Reproduce the problem** Steps to reproduce the behavior: All parameters (except individual and bodyparts) were default in the GUI setting, the only difference I noticed between the GUI and tone config file is that the "select the network" default in GUI is "resnet+50â€œ, but in the config file it is "dlcrnet_ms5". **Screenshots** config ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44795395/121915145-f049e200-cd00-11eb-8c29-ea99b193901d.png) inference ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44795395/121915316-196a7280-cd01-11eb-8955-55a08547e132.png) GUI[analyze videos] ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44795395/121917980-9e568b80-cd03-11eb-9a97-255dd2db9055.png) Terminal output ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44795395/121916120-dc52b000-cd01-11eb-9bb0-1084fafc8772.png) **Additional context** Add any other context about the problem here.
